mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_scd_apply( apply_no, apply_emp, status, deal_emp, remark, apply_time, deal_time, back_time, create_time, modify_time, create_emp, modify_emp, deal_text, apply_text )VALUES ( #{applyNo}, #{applyEmpId}, #{status}, #{dealEmpId}, #{remark}, #{applyTime}, #{dealTime}, #{backTime}, now(), now(), #{createEmpId}, #{modifyEmpId}, #{dealText}, #{applyText} )
mapper.select: from tb_scd_apply WHERE id=#{value} and is_valid=1
mapper.sql: SELECT id as id, apply_no as applyNo, apply_emp as applyEmpId, status as status, deal_emp as dealEmpId, remark as remark, apply_time as applyTime, deal_time as dealTime, create_time as createTime, modify_time as modifyTime, create_emp as createEmpId, modify_emp as modifyEmpId, deal_text as dealText, apply_text as applyText, (SELECT real_name from tb_scd_user WHERE id=createEmpId) as createEmpName, (SELECT real_name from tb_scd_user WHERE id=modifyEmpId) as modifyEmpName, (SELECT real_name from tb_scd_user WHERE id=applyEmpId) as applyEmpName, (SELECT real_name from tb_scd_user WHERE id=dealEmpId) as dealEmpName
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_scd_order set is_valid=0, modify_time=now(), modify_emp=modifyEmpId where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(item.dev_num) from tb_scd_apply_item item LEFT JOIN tb_scd_apply apply ON apply.id=item.apply_id where item.dev_id=#{value} and apply.status in (2,3)
